item.title: Hurricane Melissa death toll rises as aid struggles to reach parts of Jamaica
item.description: Authorities report at least 30 people have been killed in Haiti and 19 in Jamaica as a result of the devastating storm.

item.title: Nvidia strikes bumper AI deals with Asia tech giants
item.description: Fresh from $5 trillion valuation, global chips giant Nvidia has signed deals with LG, Hyundai and Samsung

item.title: Latvian MPs vote to pull out of treaty on protecting women from violence
item.description: Several thousand people protested against the vote, and it is now up to the president to decide the next step.

item.title: Israel confirms identities of hostages' bodies returned by Hamas
item.description: The bodies were identified as those of Amiram Cooper and Sahar Baruch, the Israeli prime minister's office said.

item.title: Japanese series that inspired Power Rangers to end after 50 years, reports say
item.description: The franchise is the inspiration for many other superhero shows that have aired in Asia.
